EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-11-CAE-Atlanta-091417.ES-2017-09-11-CAE-Atlanta-091417
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Giants vs Rockies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/tsa-turbonomic-dine-and-dash-tickets-36586854266]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I am pleased to invite you to an upcoming Dine and Dash event on Thursday, September 14th at Cabernet Steakhouse hosted by Technical & Scientific Application Inc. (TSA), then head to the casa with a warm dinner in hand from Cabernet for your entire family.
Join myself and your fellow technologists to discuss the next wave of IT Modernization, the cloud paradigm, and how other top-tier technology departments in Fortune 500 enterprises are strategizing for tomorrow.
TSA Turbonomic Dine and Dash <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/tsa-turbonomic-dine-and-dash-tickets-36586854266]]> Cabernet Steakhouse 5575 Windward Parkway, Alpharetta, GA 30004 Thursday, September 14th 4:00 pm to 5:45 pm EDT
Come discuss how you can leverage Turbonomic to assure performance in a complex environment and go home a hero.
To RSVP, register online here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/tsa-turbonomic-dine-and-dash-tickets-36586854266]]>. I hope to see you there.
Sincerely,
Steve Corndell Vice President of Turbonomic
